name: Planestroller
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare #30! A super short, sort of rough around the edges puzzler about a badly drawn wizard who can swap between different planes of existence. Similar conceptually to a puzzle platformer I recently released called 'Another Perspective', but that's just the way the LD theme happened to go!

Decided to do something top down to at least get away from my platformer crutch, resulting in something uh, well just play it. It's really short.

All you need to play is love. And the arrow keys.
